Docs.summary: Represents a missing <see cref="T:System.Object">. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Missing class is used to invoke a method with a default argument, typically when using reflection.
Only one instance of Missing, which is returned by the <xref:System.Reflection.Missing.Value> field, ever exists.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the Missing object to invoke a method with a default argument by using reflection.
